name: Road to Hell
description:
"The road to Hell is paved with good intentions."
Road to Hell is an exploration of that theme, often to a (hopefully) humorous and exaggerated extent. A small "choose your own adventure" of sorts, where you make simple decisions with disastrous results!

Dark Comedy game made during Global Game Jam 2017 (but not as part of it).

Controls (Keyboard) -
Movement: Arrow Keys 
Confirm/Select: Z, Enter, Space 
Cancel: X, Escape 

Controls (Mouse) -
Confirm/Select: Left-click
Cancel: Right-click

Controls (XBox 360 Controller) -
Movement: D-pad/Analog
Confirm/Select: A-button
Cancel: B-Button

Story / Level & Game Design -
Josh Grand (@faelimjg)

Artist / Story / Level & Sound Design -
Shera Starr (@anocturnaldream)

RPG Maker MV Plugins -
Yanfly Engine Plugins (Core Engine, Message Core, Call Event)
Tyruswoo's Follower Control

All non-stock audio was from Incompetech.
"Anachronist", "And Awaken", "Batty McFaddin", "Bumbly March", "Clear Air", "Easy Lemon", "Five Card Shuffle", "Golly Gee", "Hackbeat", "Hyperfun", "One-eyed Maestro", "Pyro Flow", "Quirky Dog", "Run Amok", "Rynos Theme", "Scheming Weasel (faster version)", "Silly Fun", "Sinfonia No. 3 in D Major - BWV 789", "Somewhere Sunny", "Sonata 17", "Sunshine", "The Show Must Be Go"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
